item.description:
This is not a meetup until someone buys a raffle ticket for $10.00 and wins a chance to throw out the first pitch at Fenway Park on August 6 game vs Texas Rangers.

Winner gets:

To Throw Out the First Pitch on August 6 at Fenway Park

Four First Row Pavillion Seats to the Game

Round Trip Limo Service

Dinner for four at the Shawmut Pavillion ($400.00 value)

Behind the Scenes Tour of Fenway Park

Purchase Raffle Tickets while they last:

www.stonehamtheatre.org

Call 781-279-2200

Visit Box Office at 395 Main Street, Stoneham Tuesday theu Saturday 1pm - 6pm

Tickets $10.00 each or $100.00 for 12

Good Luck
item.name: Would You Pay $10.00 to Throw Out The First Pitch at Fenway Park?
